Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: Tv tech reviewers: we tested over 100 colors and found the red was 3% off. Additionally 28% of TVs tested had superior contrast. We cannot recommend this TV at this time. Also tv tech reviewers: the ui felt a little slow sometimes idk
